jobDescription: Working closely with the Chief Executive officer (CEO), the role holder will be responsible to lead the strategic marketing communications and operational delivery of activity for the Guardian Life Insurance Ltd. Will define and drive the brand to develop marketing campaigns and activity. Leading the marketing team & developing our brand proposition and providing marketing direction across the organization
jobResponsibility: To conduct credit risk assessment of business proposals to identify risk and mitigation.To develop/ update Credit Risk Management framework and policies.To perform any other tasks assigned by the Management.To participate in field visit arranged as part of project due diligence; and
educationalBackgrounds: BBA/MBA/Master degree in Finance, Economics with minimum CGPA of 3.00;
